Title: D1: MyUni Systems Foundations
Description: Core backend: DB, API, IaC, CI/CD, Static Website

Title: D1.1: Infrastructure as Code (Terraform)
Description:
Setup minimal Terraform:
- Create Firestore DB
- Create Cloud Storage bucket (static website)
- Create Cloud Run service placeholder
- Create service accounts
(HINT: Keep Terraform tiny; just enough to give confidence)

Title: D1.2: Define Database Schema
Description:
Create Firestore collections:
- students
- courses
- enrolments
(HINT: Only add fields needed for general enquiries)

Title: D1.3: Migration Simulation Framework
Description:
Create folder `migrations/`
- 0001_init.py
- simple migration runner
(HINT: Not real migrations; simulating process for learning)

Title: D1.4: Backend API Skeleton
Description:
FastAPI project with 2 endpoints:
- GET /public/courses
- GET /public/courses/{id}
(HINT: pure read-only for now)

Title: D1.5: Load Sample Data
Description:
Add JSON/CSV file with:
- 5 sample courses
- Intake dates
(HINT: simple data, no complexity)

Title: D1.6: Static Website
Description:
Create Cloud Storage static site:
- Basic HTML page
- List of courses
(HINT: do NOT overthink design)

Title: D1.7: CI/CD Pipeline for MyUni API
Description:
Cloud Build trigger:
- Build container
- Run migrations
- Deploy to Cloud Run
(HINT: small and simple)

Title: D1.8: Backups
Description:
Automate weekly DB export:
- Scheduled Cloud Function
(HINT: one-liner export, no restore yet)

Title: D2: AskMyUni Agentic Foundations
Description: Build orchestrator skeleton + fake agents + CI/CD

Title: D2.1: Orchestrator Skeleton
Description:
Create Cloud Run function:
- POST /processEmail
- Hardcoded example output
(HINT: focus on workflow shell)

Title: D2.2: Agent_VerifyIdentity (Fake V0)
D2.3: Agent_L1Support (Fake V0)
Description:
Basic categorisation:
- Always return 'General'
- Generic response string

Title: D2.4: Minimal Workflow
Description:
Implement:
- verifyIdentity()
- l1Support()
- return combined result
(HINT: no parallel logic yet)

Title: D2.5: CI/CD Pipeline (AskMyUni)
Description:
Cloud Build trigger for orchestrator:
- Build
- Deploy to Cloud Run

Title: D2.6: Logging/Observability Setup
Description:
Add:
- correlation IDs
- simple structured logs
(HINT: minimal structuredJSON output)

Title: D3: AskMyUni MVP
Description: General enquiry support working end-to-end

Title: D3.1: L1 Agent V1
Description:
Add:
- Query classification (General vs Unknown)
- Fetch data from MyUni API
(HINT: first real tool use)

Title: D3.2: Orchestrator Parallel Pattern
Description:
Implement:
- Parallel verifyIdentity + analyzeQuery
- Wait for verification step
(HINT: identity still fake but structure real)

Title: D3.3: Human Escalation (General)
Description:
If Unknown:
- create fake Supervisor ticket
- include summary + raw query

Title: D3.4: Knowledge Base Integration
Description:
Use MyUni public API as 'KB'
(HINT: no RAG yet, just real data fetch)

Title: D3.5: Output Formatter
Description:
Standard JSON output format:
- path
- agent outputs
- final message
